thread.title: Kailash Satyarthi’s Nobel Prize stolen- The New Indian Express
thread.title_full: Kailash Satyarthi’s Nobel Prize stolen- The New Indian Express

title: Kailash Satyarthi’s Nobel Prize stolen- The New Indian Express
text:
Kailash Satyarthi’s Nobel Prize stolen By ANI | Published: 07th February 2017 11:11 AM | Last Updated: 07th February 2017 12:21 PM | A+ A A- | 0 Share Via Email Indian Nobel Peace Prize laureate Kailash Satyarthi. ( File | AP) NEW DELHI: The Nobel Prize of nobel laureate and social activist Kailash Satyarthi was found stolen on Tuesday morning. 
The theft took place at Satyarthi's residence last night. 
Many important and valuable things including his Nobel Prize were found to be stolen. 
A case will be registered in the Kalkaji Police Station in this regard. 
Satyarthi is a renowned Indian child rights activist and the winner of Nobel Peace Prize in 2014. 
He is the founder of the Bachpan Bachao Andolan (BBA), an organization dedicated towards the eradication of child labor and rehabilitation of the rescued former child workers. TAGS
